title: Loneliness
verses: Hebrews 13:5 (WEB) — “I will in no way leave you… nor forsake you.”
Psalm 68:6 (WEB) — “God sets the lonely in families.”
Isaiah 43:2 (WEB) — “When you pass through the waters, I will be with you.”
body: You are not alone—God is present and God’s people are near. Reach out to one person this week, and re-engage a church rhythm of worship and table.
prayer: Father, meet me in my loneliness. Draw me into Your presence and into community. Use me to encourage someone else today. Amen.
